scripts.build: bun tsc && bun run build:assets && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.build:assets: cp brain.md dist/ && mkdir -p dist/conf && cp -r conf/* dist/conf/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:web: cd web && bun install && bun run build
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:web && bun run build:inspector
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean && bun run clean:inspector && rm -rf web/dist web/dist-production web/node_modules
scripts.rebuild: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.rebuild:all: bun run clean:all && bun run build:all
